actors

Class TwitterActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractActorWithTimers
      • actors.TwitterActor

  • public class TwitterActor
extends AbstractActorWithTimers
    The actor which get the continuously twitter informations form TwitterActionController and pass these information to UserActor
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rong Xie

      The class which get the twitter informations from TwitterActionController
      static class  TwitterActor.RegisterMsg
      The void class which is used for informing TwitterActor to add new UserActor to HashSet

      The action which tell the message(twitter informations) to each UserActor

      The action is executed before creating the TwitterActor, which initializes the twitter's listener(including how to do when there is coming indicated twitter informations) and the security key of twitter api
